---
title: "Test Clustering"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Load Packages
library(tidyverse)
library(robotstxt)
library(ggrepel)

#Import data
test_cluster <- read_csv("Excel Wrangling.csv")

test_cluster_new <- test_cluster %>%
  rename(graduation_rate = `Graduation Rate`)%>%
  rename(demographic = Demographic) %>%
  rename(earnings = Earnings) %>%
  slice(-(46:66))

ggplot(data = test_cluster_new, aes(x = earnings, y = graduation_rate)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_text_repel(aes(label = demographic), size = 3) +
  labs(x = "Earnings", 
       y = "Graduation Rates") +
  facet_wrap(~ Year)

```
